metadata.name: El Capitan
metadata.description:
The first Drop from Sam King Studio. This was dropped to all the collectors of my work so far, both from [Roots](https://roots.samking.photo) and [ICE64](https://ice64.com). I appreciate you collecting my art, it means a lot to me, so thank you!

This photo of El Capitan was taken while visiting the Yosemite Valley in 2019.
